cause.description:
Spread the word of the genocide that is happening in darfur. You don't have to do anything. You just have to speak about it. Tell your freind, your cousins, your brother and sister, your parents. Spend a few minutes of your time to speak about it. Let everyone know you care!!
1. Everyone has a right to live.
2. Freedome to the innocents of darfur.
3. Genocide is dark side of humanity
cause.name: Darfur
